english.segment1: Everlasting God. The years go by but youÂ’re unchanging. In this fragile world. You are the only firm foundation. Always loving, always true. Always merciful and good, so good
english.segment2: Yesterday today and forever. You are the same, you never change. Yesterday today and forever. You are faithful and we will trust in You
english.segment3: Uncreated One. You have no end and no beginning. Earthly power fades. But there is no end to Your kingdom. Always loving, always true. Always merciful and good, so good
english.segment4: Yahweh, God unchanging. Yahweh, firm foundation. Yahweh, God unchanging. Yahweh, firm foundation
